description:
Spiritual fulfillment is one of the primary tools that helps us on our journey to wisdom. Our ancestors knew this. And they have given us a way to make this change—the power of witchcraft. But do witches exist? They absolutely do. Through the information in this course, you’ll find out what and who witches really are. You’ll also enhance your own spirituality and will grow and become empowered through the wisdom of the craft.

This course introduces you to the beliefs and moral code of Wicca. We also discuss the history of witchcraft and its growing popularity in the present day.

This course takes an in-depth look at Wiccan beliefs. We also examine some of the responsibilities of being a witch and introduce Wiccan ritual and some basic magickal tools.

In this course you will learn how to prepare yourself for ritual. You’ll also learn how and where to do ritual.

This course takes a closer look at ritual and celebrates the Wiccan holidays. You’ll also learn about magickal natural objects and entities.

This course shows you how to work with astrology and the calendar to enhance the affects of your magick.

This course is where you will learn all about spells—how to write them and how to cast them. You’ll also learn about foretelling the future and gain some new insight into your dreams.
title: Wicca and Witchcraft for beginners
